description: This table contains any flags attached directly to a case record.

columns.name: REQUISITION_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: CASE_FLAGS_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores any flags that are put on the case.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: CASE_FLAGS_CMT
columns.description:
A free text comment associated with each case flag.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: CASE_FLAGS_C_NAME

columns.name: AP_CASE_FLAG_GRP_C_NAME
columns.description:
The flag group category ID for the case.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Subspecialty
